content: this adorable no-sew amigurumi chick works up quickly and is perfect for spring easter or just because designed with simplicity in mind this pattern eliminates the need for sewing making it a fun and beginner-friendly project with its round squishy shape and tiny wings made right into the body this little chick is sure to bring a smile to anyone s face * i made this amigurumi using the yarn under single_crochet 1 technique this technique makes the stitches tighter and appears more aligned * use the ultimate finish 2 to close up the amigurumi crochet in continuous rounds do not join at the end of each round * use a running stitch marker 3 to keep your place when crocheting in rounds * if you re unsure how to change color use my step-by-step guide on changing color in crochet 4 * **optional** i used the invisible increase and invisible decrease for a nicer finish * use different yarn weights/categories and the appropriate hook size for this project to make it bigger/smaller 1 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2022/05/how-to-yarn-under-single-crochet html 2 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/close-amigurumi-ultimate-finish html 3 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/how-to-use-running-stitch-marker html 4 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/how-to-change-color-in-crochet html
